name: Voodooism the Sequel
summary:
My second original album, the sequel to Voodooism. Spent so much time on this. 
This couldn't be possible at all without your support, so before anyone, I'd like to thank you. Yes you, the one reading this right now. You are amazing. 

I decided to step things up, so first things first, I needed more awesome guests, and I got Bazz, Izna and Volant to join, in addition to the usual Nhato. 
I also commissioned a music video by murAta Yuzi. 
Third, I wanted the art to be grand, so I found this amazing artist named Eric Dagley. He does some amazing stuff. Really, go look at his art, it's in the credits.
info:
• 艺术家: Nhato、cYsmix
  • 发售日期: 2014-12-27
  • 价格: $8 USD
  • 录音: Kusemono Records
  • 碟片数量: 1
